description: This file defines a React functional component named NoteEditor, which provides a UI for creating or editing notes. It manages state for the note's title and content, handles keyboard events, and renders a modal dialog with input fields and action buttons.

methods.name: NoteEditor
methods.description: React component for note creation and editing, with handlers for saving, closing, and managing note state.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Invokes the onSave callback with the current note data, including optional id, and trimmed title and content.
